text:
@MikeBloomberg What kind of human being would call one the novel #coronavirus, a hoax? To me this is the most egregious thing he has said to date. To deceive people about a deadly disease?Talk to the thousands who have lost family members in China.Dangerously irresponsible!
 #25thAmendmentNow
